item.description:
This is an informal professional and social group, where you can get to know people and build positive, lasting relationships.

We aim to create a positive, relaxed atmosphere, where people can meet new
friends and business contacts. Our meetups run the gamut from fun activities such as movies, bowling, and dining out to formal business meetings and personal development workshops.

If you have any ideas for a meetup, please feel free to email the organizer. We aim for 100% participation so if you don't see meetups to your liking, it is up to you to send suggestions.

Welcome again, and hope to see you at a future meetup.

PLEASE NOTE:

Inactive members will be removed from the group

As of January 1, 2013 all members must have a real profile photo to remain in the group.
item.name: Professionals of Color Networking Group
